description: On those cold days outdoors it’s important to wear a breathable base layer that keeps you warm and balances temperature. That's why we have developed the Trift line that features a Merino wool/polyamide blend. The wool content insulates and inhibits odors, the synthetic fibers make the longsleeve durable and quick-drying. Seamless construction allows a body zone- specific arrangement of different material structures for optimal regulation of your body temperature. MAMMUT obtains its Merino wool from suppliers who care about animal welfare and are against mulesing.
name: Mammut Trift LS - Mens

specs.value: Knitted Seamless Baselayer - 58% Polyamide, 40% Wolle, 2% Elastan
a perfect balance of warmth, odor control, moisture management and durability
